text:
This page:  http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/doc/standard-doc/intro.html  shows
Request  and Response as being deprecated.

But clicking on the request page
(http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/doc/request-doc/intro.html), or any of the
deprecated libraries for that matter shows them as being supported.
creator: brian.bonner@paraware.com
rahul@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the reports.

These taglibs are not built nightly, and the build is needed to reflect 
changes onto the website. I've sprinkled some magic dust for now. If you re-
visit the web pages, please make sure you're not seeing browser cache.
